aa....kohomada sira dayal eka neda?kohomawunath hedima wage issara kiwwe lesiyenma andanna puluwan unta thama.eeth ithin chinu kiyanne lokuma janagahanayata himikam kiyana ratane.ee wagema loke wadiyenma bhawitha wenneth china mandarin bhashawa thama.ingrisith eekata dewaniwela thiyenawa.thawa tika dohakin loke lokuma aarthiketa himikam kiyanneth china thamayi bolaw.kohomawunath chine kiyanne issara indalama dadara sayis nirmana karapu porawal thama.hodama udaharanaya china maha prakaraya.ape rateth matha kale loku loku nirmana hama ekatama wage chinnu athagahala thiyenawa.eewa gana katha mokatada neda....?kohomawunath ada kiyanna yanne chinnu thamange rate matha kalinawa karala thiyena karamin sitina maha parimana nirmana kihipayak gana thorathuru...
